title.narrative: B2B: Vector Solutions Ltd and BestNet AS

description.narrative: The objective of the cooperation is to establish a state-of-the-art production of LLIN mosquito nets in Kenya. By establishing a production facility in Kenya the local company Vector Solutions will gain a better competitive position in the market and new technology regarding LLIN nets will be transferred to Kenya enabling the partnership to gain new market shares in Kenya and potentially to export the nets. The idea of technology transfer to Africa builds on the basic philosophy that the donor funds spend on fighting malaria could have a double effect if they were also providing work and financial prosperity in the countries at need. Furthermore it makes sense to have the expertise, production facilities and technology to produce the tools to fight malaria in the areas where malaria is a real threat.
